name: Watch Out (itch) (21stargames - Varde Siddharth)
description:
Watch Out is a platformer in which you have to reach to the flag by using Perception view / by Changing your perception.

It was created for a Game jam named DevJam.

it is created by Varde Siddharth - 21stargames.

Varde Siddharth  Designed the Game And created it's Ui And Programmed the whole game.
